text: Ani jevha musa apalya janasamuhacya lokanna mhanale, he majhya jamaticya lokanno! Tumhi vasarala (daivata) banavuna svatahvara motha juluma kela ahe. Ata tumhi apalya nirmana karanaryakade dhyana dya. Svatahla (gunhegarala) apalya hatanni thara kara. Allahacya drstine yataca tumacyasathi bhala'i ahe. Tevha allahane tumaci tauba (ksamayacana) kabula keli. Nihsansaya toca tauba kabula karanara ani daya karanara ahe
